answers.answer: your doctor will prescribe the right antibiotics to take
I had a yeast infection with my second child due to gestational diabetes my Dr just gave me ointment.
They will give antifungals for the infection but ask your dox what to use for the burning and itching. Generally monistat or something like it works well for that.
I just got over having a yeast infection it burned n itched...all my doc gave me was an antifungel for bith inside n out n went away in 3days
I get them all through out my pregnancies I also get uti's its very common and very treat able and drinking cranberry juice will help as well

I've had 3 so far this pregnancy and it is annoying the heck outta me...The first 2 times I took the diflucan pill (one time pill) n the last time I was told I can go get the over the counter monistat 7. The only time I ever get them is when I'm pregnant and by me having twins this time i have an overload of hormones surging through my body...I've had so many pregnancy symptoms...it's crazy lol

question: Does anybody else get or has had one. Anything to do for the burning and all. Its embarssing to ask about them but oh well.
title: yeast infections
